frame.name: Being_relevant
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is related to some cognitive action, the <fen>Endeavor</fen>, of a <fen>Cognizer</fen>. In many LUs, the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is null-instantiated and implied as being the speaker or another participant of the <fen>Endeavor</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Phenomenon">This book</fex> is <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>relevant</t> <fex name="Endeavor">to my essay</fex>.</ex> <ex>This book is very <t>relevant</t> to <fex name="Cognizer">my</fex> essay.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Phenomenon
FE.definition: <def-root>Something that is profiled in the mind of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> as being related to mental <fen>Endeavor</fen>s.</def-root>

FE.name: Endeavor
FE.definition: <def-root>A cognitive action (eg discussion, decision) performed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is connected in some way.</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition: <def-root>A participant in the mental <fen>Endeavor</fen> to which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is related. This frame element is often null-instantiated and may be inferred from the <fen>Endeavor</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of how related the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is to the <fen>Endeavor</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Specification
FE.definition:
<def-root>The knowledge or situation that mediates the relevance of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> to the <fen>Endeavor</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Specification">How</fex> does Assad 's family dynamic play into his intransigence ?</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: relevant.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having to do with the immediate topic of interest

lexUnit.name: irrelevant.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: not connected to a salient topic

lexUnit.name: pertinent.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: significant in terms of the current topic of discussion
